description: Out of bound access due to access of uninitialized memory segment in an array of pointers while normal camera open close in Snapdragon Consumer IOT, Snapdragon Mobile in QCS605, SDM439, SDM630, SDM636, SDM660, SDX24

enisaIdProduct.product_version: QCS605, SDM439, SDM630, SDM636, SDM660, SDX24
